featured.text: It looks like a precisely engineered jigsaw puzzle, each branch growing just perfectly so it almost, 11 , touches the neighboring tree.
Perfectly clear ice blocks weighing 140 kg and measuring 100 cm × 50 cm
Yet, knowing perfectly well 19 a troublemaker his son was, the father refused to give them any money.

definition.en_def: In a manner that is entirely without flaws or defects.
definition.example: She executed the dance perfectly, impressing everyone in the audience.
